mapper.insert: insert into bucket (num, id, type, subject, content, image, likecount, withcount, hashtag, area, dday, writeday) values (0, #{id}, 'solo', #{subject}, #{content}, #{image}, 0, 0, #{hashtag}, #{area}, #{dday}, now())
mapper.update: update bucket set withcount = withcount + 1 where num = #{num}
update bucket set likecount = likecount + 1 where num = #{num}
